title: Halo 3 Road To Recon
heading: Achievement Unlocked
body: The Road to Recon is open. Head over to www.bungie.net, login to or create your profile with a linked Xbox LIVE gamertag, and learn exactly how close you are to earning your own set of Recon armor for Halo 3. If you're reading this message, chances are you've already earned several of the required Halo 3 and Halo 3: ODST achievements you need. Check out your Service Record at www.bungie.net/stats/halo3 for details.
